DOC.brief_title: Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics Pharmacodynamics TAP311 Healthy Subjects Dyslipidemic Patients
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female subject age 18 65 year age include , good health determine past medical history , physical examination , electrocardiogram , laboratory test screen . OR untreated dyslipidemic patient . Subjects must weigh least 50 kg participate study , must body mass index ( BMI ) within range 18 36 kg/m2 . Able communicate well investigator , understand comply requirement study . Use investigational drug time enrollment . Active treatment type 1 diabetes type 2 diabetes mellitus . A past medical history ECG abnormality , document cardiac arrhythmia cardiovascular disease . History malignancy organ system , treat untreated , within past 5 year . Pregnant nursing ( lactate ) woman . Smokers . Use prescription drug , herbal supplement and/or overthecounter ( OTC ) medication , dietary supplement . History drug alcohol abuse within 12 month prior dose . Any surgical medical condition , acute unstable chronic disease may , base investigator 's opinion , jeopardize patient case participation study Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
